turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a coffee from Peet's espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, let's make that order for you. what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you show me the menu?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you can find the menu for peet's at peets.com/menu. would you like me to list out some of their popular items?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Caffe Latte, Golden Caffè Latte, Iced Latte, Caffe Mocha, Caramel Latte, and Caffe Con Panna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do any of these sound good to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I would like to order an ice vanilla latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a large.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's see.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that would be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm you want a large Iced vanilla latte with almond milk from Peet's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which peet's did you want me to place that order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm sorry. Can you repeat that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which peet's did you want me to place that order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would the one in Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have the total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for this will be $3.40.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you very much. Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok the order has been placed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink will be ready at the Peet's in Colorado Springs in 6 minutes. Enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much, goodbye.
